vision.title: Vision
vision.subtitle: NEOS Corporation transforms tomorrow's vision into today's reality

professional.title: Professional
professional.heading:
NEOS Corporation is
a group of experts with abundant expertise.
professional.description:
We have assembled the industry's top talent
by recruiting professionals from various fields.
Through independent team structures,
we pursue professional business
with enhanced expertise.

humanism.title: Humanism
humanism.heading:
At the core of NEOS Corporation
lies people.
humanism.description:
Rather than being a company focused solely on business,
we pursue a corporate culture based on humanism
where warm relationships flow between people,
allowing everyone to prosper together
in mutual growth.

global.title: Global
global.heading:
NEOS Corporation's competitive advantage
is our global network.
global.description:
We have already proven our capabilities
through years of business partnerships
with global companies and media production.
Based on our overwhelming global network,
we actively support overseas expansion
through meticulous strategy and collaboration.

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: NEOS Corporation is always dedicated to our clients' success stories

history.title: Our Journey
history.subtitle: Key milestones in our growth and development

1999.title: Establishment of NEOS advertising and video production company
1999.description: Started as a specialized advertising and video production company

2003.title: Corporate conversion to NEOS Corporation
2003.description: Corporate conversion for systematic business growth

2004.title: Establishment of advertising casting business team
2004.description: Expansion into specialized advertising casting division

2006.title: Nintendo KOREA LAUNCHING
2006.description: Overall responsibility for advertising production casting

2009.title: UNIQLO KOREA LAUNCHING & Establishment of entertainment management team
2009.description: Overall responsibility for UNIQLO Korea launch advertising production casting and expansion into entertainment management business

2012.title: Former actress Jung Yu-mi wins SBS Acting Awards Best Actress Award
2012.description: Proved management capabilities through talent achievements

2013.title: Establishment of subsidiary NEOS Entertainment Corporation
2013.description: Business expansion through establishment of entertainment-specialized subsidiary

2015.title: Casting business team enters China
2015.description: First step into global market expansion

2018.title: Former actor Jang Seung-jo wins MBC Acting Awards Best Actor Award & Establishment of IP business team
2018.description: Continuous talent achievements and expansion into content value creation through intellectual property business

2019.title: Establishment of label NEOSTORY
2019.description: Launch of content label specialized in webtoon and drama production

2020.title: NEOSTORY label - Akiko Higashimura webtoon 'Do You Remember Me?'
2020.description: Simultaneous serialization on KakaoPage/Piccoma in Korea and Japan

2021.title: Establishment of NEOSTORY Corporation
2021.description: NEOSTORY Corporation - Akiko Higashimura webtoon 'Do You Remember Me?' serialized on Kakao Webtoon

2022.title: NEOSTORY Corporation - Suo•Abidi Inoue webtoon '26th Murder' simultaneous Korea-Japan serialization
2022.description: Global webtoon business expansion through Kakao Webtoon and Piccoma

2023.title: Continuous global expansion
2023.description: Sustained growth in entertainment and content production fields
